meanings.sent1: The unthought idea suddenly popped into my mind.
meanings.sent3: The unthought consequence of his decision left us all laughing.
meanings.sent4: The unthought consequences of his actions snowballed into chaos.
meanings.sent5: The unthought possibility lingered in the back of my mind.

meanings.definition: Not having been thought about or considered
meanings.sent1: The unthought plan caught us off guard.
meanings.sent2: The unthought consequences of his actions were evident.
meanings.sent3: His unthought excuse made us chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The unthought implications of her words hit me like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The unthought solution dawned on me suddenly.
